title: Bugged PROJECT Hunter Icon Missing from Loot

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I completed the Prologue mission and can even see it complete in my Missions tab but can't find the icon anywhere in my loot or collection. Icon tab is empty in my loot. Please help!

replies.body: That icon is automatically added to your account and won't appear in your loot. You need to click on your icon to change it, and it should be near the top of the list.
